mapper.select: SELECT RESOURCE_NO AS resourceNo, SORT_ORDER AS sortOrder, RESOURCE_TYPE AS resourceType, RESOURCE_PATTERN AS resourcePattern, RESOURCE_NM AS resourceNm FROM TB_RESOURCE ORDER BY SORT_ORDER ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_RESOURCE( RESOURCE_NM, RESOURCE_PATTERN, RESOURCE_TYPE, SORT_ORDER ) VALUES( #{resourceNm}, #{resourcePattern}, #{resourceType}, #{sortOrder} )
